input: 2. user: A bustling city street at night, with bright neon lights illuminating the surroundings. Crowds of people are visible, crossing the street amid tall skyscrapers. A taxi speeds by. There's an energetic, vibrant feel to the nighttime atmosphere.

Amidst this fervent energy, a speeding taxi blurs by, leaving an electrified trail. This image will evoke a sense of dynamic energy, capturing the exuberance of urban nightlife."
